ygData.subject: Re: necromancer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well the guards won t attack you although the innkeepers will. The guards in freeport also leave you alone, although some shopkeepers don t. As far as I am
ygData.messageBody:
> but I can give advice easily enough. When you reach level 8 or
> so and you
> start adventuring into the commons, don't go near any human npc's
> - they'll
> attack you on sight. That's the biggest disadvantage to being a
> dark elf -
> nobody likes you.

Well the guards won't attack you although the innkeepers
will. The guards in freeport also leave you alone, although
some shopkeepers don't.

As far as I am concerned though, Nektulos forest sucks for
low-mid levels, it has decent experience, can be quite rough
at times but has *awful* money. Most necros would be much
better off migrating and getting bound to grobb asap - the
innothule swamp is one of the best newbie areas in the game.
